section.title: Reporting a Scammer
section.description: To report a scammer, follow these steps: 1. Tap on the "Report Scammer" button on the main screen. 2. Fill in the required information, including username, email, phone number, website, severity, and description. 3. Submit the report by tapping the "Submit" button.

section.title: Viewing Scammers List
section.description: The Scammers List displays reported scammers. Scroll through the list to browse, and tap on a scammer to view more details.

section.title: Updating Scammer Information
section.description: To update a scammer's information, follow these steps: 1. Tap on the scammer in the list to view details. 2. Tap on the "Edit" button. 3. Make the necessary changes and save the updated information by tapping the "Save" button.

section.title: Deleting a Scammer
section.description: To delete a scammer's report, swipe left on the scammer in the list, and tap the "Delete" button.

section.title: Help and Support
section.description: For further assistance or questions, tap on the "Help" button on the main screen or contact our support team at support@scamguard.com.
